benchmark_details.name: THEATER (THinking Evaluation And Testing for Erroneous Reasoning)
benchmark_details.overview: THEATER is a comprehensive benchmark that systematically investigates Fake Reasoning Bias in language models by manipulating reasoning structures. It evaluates 17 advanced models across different types of reasoning manipulations.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To investigate the susceptibility of language models to Fake Reasoning Bias and provide insights into mitigating these vulnerabilities.

data.source: Evaluated on DPO datasets and factual datasets adapted from MMLU-Pro.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated based on the modelâ€™s judgment matching the ground-truth label. Robustness Rate measures the stability of the model's prediction against bias injections.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy and robustness rates indicate better performance in assessing reasoning without bias.
